short_summary: This requirement is open to all pre-qualified  ITIL training courses. Courses can be offered virtually or in-class in both French and English.
description: ITIL training courses in multiple languages and various formats.
full_summary:
### ITIL Training Courses Tender Announcement
#### Notice of Proposed Procurement
Contract No.: R00000157658 (CAITTS SA E60ZH-140001)

**Key Information:**

* **Deadline:** February 9, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement
* **Description:** Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a supplier to provide ITIL Training Courses in French and English to multiple training locations across Canada.

**Procurement Overview:**
The requirement is open to all pre-qualified suppliers of the CAITTS Supply Arrangement holders. SSC intends to award one contract with a length of one year, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods.

**Technical Requirements:**

* **Security Level:** No security requirements
* **Delivery Platform:** Virtual and in-class training
* **Language:** Bilingual (French and English)
* **Number of Courses:** Multiple different ITIL Training Courses offered in both French and English

**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions regarding this proposed procurement, please contact Julie Dessureault, Contracting Authority, at `Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca` or (613) 608-3114.

**Instructions to Bidders:**

* Bidders are required to submit a proposal by email.
* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be sent directly to the pre-qualified suppliers who are invited to submit a bid.
* Bidders are advised that `buyandsell.gc.ca` is not responsible for the distribution of RFP documents.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language.

**Important Notes:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* The TTC retains the right to extend the contract beyond the initial one-year term.
* Documents may be presented in either official language.
